newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Seoul yields end flat, Jinro news affects.
newsitem.headline: Seoul yields end flat, Jinro news affects.

text.p: Yields on three-year benchmark corporate bonds ended flat on Tuesday for the third consecutive day, dealers said. They said liquidity remained stable but troubles at Jinro prevented the yield from falling.
The three-month CD yields also ended flat along with rates for three-month Commercial Paper (CP) on fears of tightening liquidity caused by Jinro's troubles, dealers said.
* Overnight average call rate at 11.53 pct vs 12.47 pct
